title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A novel about all the choices that go into a life well lived.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: Tiny changes, remarkable results—a guide to habit building.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman's act of violence.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a survivalist family.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A coming-of-age story wrapped in a murder mystery.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The inspiring memoir of the former First Lady of the US.

title: The Hate U Give
author: Angie Thomas
description: A powerful novel about racial injustice and activism.

title: Power Moves
author: Sarah Jakes
description: In 'Power Moves', Sarah Jakes offers a raw and empowering guide to stepping into your purpose, using your story as strength rather than shame.

title: How Did We Get Here?
author: Mpoomy Ledwaba
description: A powerful and honest journey of faith, healing, and growth, Mpoomy Ledwaba opens up about love, loss, and the path to discovering yourself.

title: Before I Let Go
author: Kennedy Ryan
description: A touching story of healing and second chances in love.

title: Nearly All the Men in Lagos Are Mad
author: Damilare Kuku
description: Witty tales on modern womanhood in Lagos.

title: Finding Me
author: Viola Davis
description: The journey of a woman who fought for her voice.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A fable about following your dreams.

title: Daring Greatly
author: Brené Brown
description: The power of vulnerability and courage.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: Counterintuitive advice for living a good life.

title: It Ends with Us
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A bold novel about the complexities of love and abuse.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
description: Personal finance classic with lessons on wealth building.

title: Born a Crime
author: Trevor Noah
description: Stories from a South African childhood under apartheid.

title: The Four Agreements
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
description: A code of conduct to transform your life.

title: The Book Thief
author: Markus Zusak
description: A story about a girl who steals books in Nazi Germany.
